Mojave Air and Space Port.knownFor: “ Not very user-friendly ” Reviewed March 23, 2016 The old Mojave Airport was a fascinating place, with lots of WWII, Korean War, and Vietnam War aircraft sitting out in the open for buffs to view. There was a military and airline collectible shop in the old terminal building.
